General.Name: Sharps Technology Inc. Warrant
General.Description: Sharps Technology Inc., a medical device company, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells safety syringe products in the United States. It offers Sharps Provensa, an ultra-low waste space syringe for the administration of various vaccines and injectable medications. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Melville, New York.
General.Address: 105 Maxess Road, Melville, NY, United States, 11747

0.Name: Mr. Alan R. Blackman
0.Title: Co-Chairman, Chief Investment Officer, COO & Sec.
